title: Restart stopped backend by forcing a deployment retry

requirements.text: Trigger a fresh deployment (to restart backend canister xwevn-xyaaa-aaaai-at4jq-cai) by updating the contents of the deployment retry marker file at frontend/public/deploy-retry.txt (e.g., change the ISO timestamp on line 1) without changing application functionality.

quotes: backend is still stopped; restart deployment

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/public/deploy-retry.txt is modified such that its contents differ from the previous version (e.g., line 1 timestamp updated).
No other functional application code changes are required for this build request.
After redeploy, the backend canister is running (not stopped) and the frontend DebugPanel no longer reports 'Backend Actor: Not Ready' due to IC0508 'canister is stopped'.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep backend architecture as a single Motoko actor (no new backend services).
nonGoals: Implementing new product features beyond triggering a redeploy.
Changing access control, role provisioning logic, or case CRUD behavior.
